Room.Name: Ivory Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling in a north-south direction on Ivory Way.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection of Randolf Lane is directly to the north. There is a giant amphetheater on the east side of the street. Looks like the entrance may be located to the south, judging by they way the foot traffic is headed. A small cafe with outdoor seating is on the west side.
